short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspiring your day with a motivational quote on every new tab. One quote a day, every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
